headline.main: Liberty and Security in the Age of Terror

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Seizing Dictatorial Power,'' by William Safire (column, Nov. 15): We are living in a different world. This is not an era of irrational fear motivating un-American and illegal measures. The fear is completely rational, and the measures may not yet have gone far enough.
abstract: Thayer Thompson letter holds it is time to make some changes, given a situation unprecedented in American history, where we are at war with thousands of people who can and will kill countless more Americans if we don't stop them; holds fewer restrictions on evidence-gathering and quicker trials will help in almost impossible task of prevention
